attributes.title: Plockton Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Started producing cask-conditioned ale on 1st April 2007.  Three ales are brewed, Crag;s Ale (4.3%), Starboard IPA (5.1%), and Dall Winter Sunshine (4.8%).  Beers are available locally.
